plot: Executive Producers Bill Duke and George Wallace present, a family-oriented comic documentary designed to lift the spirit of the nation. This the first project to combine the talents of comedy and gospel music.
title: Living in the Spirit Revue
plot_es: Executive Producers Bill Duke and George Wallace present, a family-oriented comic documentary designed to lift the spirit of the nation. This the first project to combine the talents of comedy and gospel music.
plot_en: Executive Producers Bill Duke and George Wallace present, a family-oriented comic documentary designed to lift the spirit of the nation. This the first project to combine the talents of comedy and gospel music.
